Articles.Content:
How could I!?!?!?! I almost forgot to buy Exxon,GE, Samsung, Amazon, eBay, J&J, IBM, Berkshire Hathaway, T elMex and SpaceX.    (I hired Bill Gates, Carlos Slim, Elon Musk and  Warren Buffet to manage our money)

Guess what! My Ally's and my mecha corp!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-13T04:10:49Z" title="02/13/2016 04:10  AM" data-short="8 yr">February 13, 2016</time> by ThaZeus**

I make Bill Gates my massage therapist.

That's it. Our Earth.
Earth is hit by the moon. My melted Earth.

\*uses planet buster\*

My shattered earth ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

I tow a piece of the shattered Earth that contains the hill into Mars orbit, graft it to Phobos, and declare the hill property of me and my allies. We open a diner.

My snacks!

Me and my allies hire Bill Gates as out waiter.

Our snacks!
I tug Phobos, hill and all, into a lower Mars orbit where the tidal forces are too great and it breaks up. My debris field and diner.

You bankrupt the diner; I purchase it back for pennies on the dollar. I convert it into a truck stop, independent of any small moon or debris field. I feed you the "special", which ensures you won't return anytime soon...

![spaceballtruckstop.jpg](http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b164/digger48/tv%20movie/spaceballtruckstop.jpg)

My truck stop!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-16T16:39:28Z" title="02/16/2016 04:39  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 16, 2016</time> by Xorth Tanovar**
wow. Guess no one else wants the Special...
I fold the universe inside out, and use the matter to build a hill the size of reality. My hill.

I unfold your universe and return it to it's previous state, with the Hill defaulting back to my possession.

My hill!

I conduct an orbital bombardment on your hill, and construct a fortress amongst the remains.

My Fortress.

I bore through the planet from the other side, end up in your basement, and literally steal the hill from under your nose.

My hill!

I continue to swim in my cash from earlier.

Who needs a hill?
Everyone needs a hill! I build a hill out of Legos. My Lego hill.

Plastic is combustible. Therefore I set your Lego hill ablaze. Once the fire dies out, I build a small hut on the pillar of ash that remains.

My ashpile!

[@Xorth Tanovar](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/71205-xorth-tanovar/) and [@Maximus97](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/75164-maximus97/), [@Matuchkin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/135127-matuchkin/) and I own 20% of the universe each. With Bill Gates, Carlos Slim, Elon Musk, and Warren Buffet to manage our money. So it's still our universe. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Nice ash pile! Did I mention the warehouse of Tsar Bomba's underground that I keep for safe keeping. Any way ***our*** ash pile.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-14T20:55:34Z" title="03/14/2016 08:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 14, 2016</time> by ThaZeus**

However, I had been secretly manipulating the government for years when I was poised as senator, and eventually elected chancellor of the senate. I finally reveal myself as Darth Maximus and establish the First Kerbal Empire.

My empire.

[![Bundeswehr_sniper_team_in_position.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/ca/Bundeswehr_sniper_team_in_position.jpg)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper_team)

We develop an army of furry, bushy desert minions with binoculars and snipers.

**Our** hill

I put a ridiculously large number of plasma guns around the base of  the snow-capped mountain in the background of [@Matuchkin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/135127-matuchkin/)'s desert picture. They will fire at anyone they see. I build a house on the mountain, and a nice little observatory. My snow-capped mountain and telescopes.

I make a small hill in the middle of Lake Michigan and call it "Abbot Island," cause secret island bunkers named after game locations are cool. Open to anyone who can hack swing bridges.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-16T22:04:15Z" title="03/16/2016 10:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 16, 2016</time> by CommanderCoye**
I build a hill in my steam libary, which means it is reinforced with the power of about 260 video games, (yes, I do have that many games).
I take your  hill by putting you under the pad during the dres 4 launch. My hill! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

I drop a fully-fueled N-1 onto your launch pad causing a [explosion the size of 7 kilotons of TNT.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Largest_artificial_non-nuclear_explosions#Rank_order_of_largest_conventional_explosions.2Fdetonations_by_magnitude)

My crater.

I travel to a remote planet close to the Kerbol system but far enough away to avoid a supernova. I build a comfy little lodge, where I will live the rest of my life with my dog.

My lodge in the middle of nowhere.
